column5: My condo is the perfect space for your stay. We are in the heart of the South Lamar (SoLa) district, right across the street from the very popular Snooze eatery, within walking distance to Zilker Park, Barton Springs Pool, Auditorium Shores, the Long Center, Alamo Drafthouse, and more. With a pool, patio, grill, cable TV, full kitchen, and king sized bed, we're your home away from home. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. We'd love to host you!
column8: Condo in SoLamar district near music & food scene
